sentences.sContent: He had relocated his family for the position from Ohio to Missouri, where he bought a home.
sentences.sCn: 为了这个职位，他从俄亥俄州举家搬迁到密苏里州，并且买了一幢房子。

sentences.sContent: There are now no more straight boring roads, and the deadly humidity of Missouri and others states are behind me.
sentences.sCn: 现在不再有那些笔直单调的长路了，密苏里和其它几个州的湿热也留在了我身后。

sentences.sContent: In Missouri, the same factors cut my victory margin almost in half, from 10 to 6 percent.
sentences.sCn: 在密苏里州，同样的因素让我的获胜优势几乎减少了一半，从10%降到6%。
